title: Are there photos and news articles in your archives that document the November 4, 1910 visit to Wilmington by Booker T. Washington and many black education and political leaders?  (Exactly 100 years ago today)
text:
Our paper archives, photographs and microfilm from 100 years ago are
in the care of the New Hanover County Public Library, downtown.



I did find this online resource that you might find useful. The link
below is to a letter written by Booker T. Washington on the date of
his visit to Wilmington.



http://www.historycooperative.org/btw/Vol.10/html/437.html
